taskbody.prereq: T24 server must be already created through a template (i.e., jAgent or Web Service ) and available in the Server view pane .

step.cmd: To start the T24 server, select the T24 Environment ([server name]) line in the Server view pane. Click on one of the following icon, located at the right side of the toolbar view:

choices.choice:
Start icon
: Server's status becomes: Active . For each deployed file, the Console view simply displays a message: Success, or T24 returned errors.

Debug icon
: Server's status becomes: Active in Debug . For each deployed file, the Console view logs the deployed file content and corresponding message: Success, or T24 returned errors. When importing elements from T24 server, XML files are also kept in location chosen during the import task.

step.stepresult: Design Studio first stops other active server and set the selected one as Active.

step.cmd:
To stop the T24 server, select the T24 Environment ([server name]) line in the Server view pane and click on Stop icon
.
